text: Hi kids!
Guess who's is here
Yes its me bob..
Join me with learning street with bob..
Hello Mr A man
Hello Bob
Kids meet Mr A
The very first letter of the alphabet
Hi kids!
Tell something about yourself Mr.A
Amazing
Yes we can suddenly see that
And awesome
Absolutely right, Mr. A! Can you tell us a few things that start with you
“Apple!”
“Ant”
Arrow”
Allligator
Awesome! Let’s hear it Again
“Apple!”
“Ant”
Arrow”
Allligator
“Wow now we know a few words starting with A”
Now Let’s show the kids how to draw you!”
Alright!”
“Mary, will you show everyone how to write the letter A”
Yes Bob!”
“Do you want me to help you Mary?”
Thankyou Bob, that would be Awesome
Start at the top, and draw a line going down and to the left.”
“Now go back to starting point of the top, and draw a line going down the other way.”
Lastly go to the middle, and draw a line straight across.”
Congratulations! There’s your A, Mary!”
That was fun, Bob! Let me draw A once again!”
I’ll start at the top, and draw a line going down and to the left.”
“Now I will go back to the the top, and draw a line going down the right”
Now I will go to the middle, and draw a line straight across.”
You’re such a fast learner Mary!”
“She is Adorable Too!!!
oooo
Marry was awesome wasn't she
ABSOLUTELY I think she did an amazing job.
Thank you Mr.A for making our Day
Before you say goodbye, would you like to listen to a song I have written for you?”
Absolutely…Would be delighted to hear it!!!
Without an A, an arrow with just be a row without an A an apple i turn into a pil
Without an A, I won’t know how to start alphabet But there’ll always be an A, don't you ...
AAA we love Mr.A. AAA amazing all the way
AAA he lead the alphabet and there is always be an A don't you
Would you like it hear one more times kids great let's sing it again..

Awesome
So kids hope you had an awesome time today learning all about Alphabet A.
I sure did. adios for now and see you soon with the new alphabet…
